import React,{ useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const FormProduct = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { loadData() }, []) const loadData = async () => { await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/product') .then((response) => setProducts(response.data)) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { } return (
